result.execSummary:
Gene A. Fowler was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Gene A. Fowler was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Gene A. Fowler

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Gene A. Fowler
Current: 2817 W. State St., Rockford, IL 61109 United States  (Effective: 03-05-2015)
Prior: 1542 Shirland Avenue, South Beloit, IL 61080
Attorney Walter H Isaacson in court.  Katharine Buker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant extradited.

Defendant Gene A. Fowler in court in custody with attorney Walter H Isaacson.  Jodi D Bollendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Rights Advised, Defendant waives Extradition freely & voluntarily, Court accepts waiver and signs order. Bond Revoked.  Status conference scheduled for June 25, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Gene A. Fowler in court in custody with attorney Cheniqua L White.  Mason C Braunschweig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed; Copy to Deft; Penalties advised; Rights given; Reading waived.  Extradition hearing scheduled for June 10, 2014, at 8:30 am.
